mapper.select: select count(*) from board_user_read where board_id = #{boardId} and user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_seq, writer, title, content, reg_dt, read_count, board_clsf) VALUES(#{userSeq}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{readCount}, #{boardClsf})
INSERT INTO board_file(board_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_url, reg_dt) VALUES(#{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT dong, aptname, buildyear, code,( SELECT dealAmount FROM housedeal WHERE house_no = hi.no ) as dealAmount FROM houseinfo hi WHERE no = #{houseNo}
